citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1035-1105 on
12/15/2015. The APHIS official attempted to make contact two times on the phone number provided and a
message was left on each attempt. In addition, the APHIS official waited 30 minutes in the facility drive way before
leaving the premises.

narrative:
2.126(b)
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1035-1105 on
12/15/2015.   The APHIS official attempted to make contact two times on the phone number provided and a
message was left on each attempt.  In addition, the APHIS official waited 30 minutes in the facility drive way before
leaving the premises.
